concept.title: Translation Manager Overview
concept.shortdesc: Batch translate audio slice idioms using AI.

section.title: What is Translation Manager?
section.p: The Translation Manager is a utility page for managing translations across all your audio slices. It identifies slices that are missing Chinese translations and allows you to translate them in bulk using AI.

section.title: Missing Translations
section.p: A slice is considered "missing translation" when:

ul.li: It has been transcribed (has English text)
No Chinese translation has been added yet

section.p: These slices cannot be effectively reviewed until they have translations.

section.title: When to Use
section.p: Use Translation Manager when you have accumulated multiple slices without translations and want to process them efficiently in one batch, rather than translating each slice individually.
